long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸ†Best tool made for people who want to export IG comments into CSV.

A brilliant comment export tool that allows you to quickly export Instagram comments to CSV with just one click. Unlock the power of Instagram comment exporting for your giveaways today!

ğŸ––  KEY FEATURES:
Export IG comments with one click.

ğŸš— DESCRIPTION Step by Step:
1.Enter a Instagram post URL
2.Click the export button

â›µï¸ SUPPORTED COLUMNS:
- comment id
- comment text
- username
- username id
- profile url
- profile pic url
- date

ğŸ”  HOW DOES IT WORK:
1. Using Instagram's official API to export data.
2. Free user can export the first 100 records.
3. Paid users can export without limits. Only $2.99!

ğŸ”’  USAGE POLICY
- No password required. 
- All the data you export is processed locally, so no one knows what you exported.
